name: COVID19ICD10PCSValueSetForSplenectomy
title: COVID19 ICD10PCS Value Set for Splenectomy
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to splenectomy and is listed as a blood disorder/hemoglobinopathy on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes splenectomy. It includes partial and total splenectomy and combination procedures (e.g., pancreatectomy with splenectomy).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes history of splenecomy, excision of accessory spleen and excision of lesions of the spleen.)

concept.display: Resection of Spleen, Percutaneous Endoscopic Approach
